data.title: The Assam Kaziranga University
data.meta_description: The Assam Kaziranga University one of the top universities in Assam, North East India, offering Engineering, Management, UG, PG Ph D courses with excellent placement opportunities.
data.text:
UNIVERSITY BY THE NUMBERS

Founded in 2012, The Assam Kaziranga University, known as KU, is one of the largest private universities in North-East India. Here students come from far and wide to make an impact, and faculty are handpicked experts in their respective fields.

Vertical Limit is an education service provider comprising of experienced industry professionals and academics who understand the rapidly changing dynamics of management education in India and brings in their expertise to develop skilled resources as opposed to generalists. The organisation is headed by Prof. Srinivas Govindrajan, who has been teaching in the B-School space for over 30 years; that includes prestigious schools such as XLRI-Jamshedpur, XIM Bhubaneswar, IIM-Calcutta, IIM Lucknow, IIM-Raipur, IIM-Shillong, IIM-Udaipur and GLIM-Chennai. Professionals from Vertical Limit work together with The Assam Kaziranga University School of Business to design and deliver skill based education which enables MBA students to get the career of their choice - whether it be in marketing, finance, digital marketing or human resources.

The Times of India Group began its operations in 1838 and is India’s oldest and largest media house. The Group is also amongst India’s most diverse media house with assets across Publishing, Radio, TV, Out of Home (OOH) and Online Media. TIMESPRO is the academic partner of The Assam Kaziranga University for the MBA (Banking & Financial Services) program, which is designed to offer in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience through several carefully chiselled modules in each area of Banking and Financial Services. Integrating a mix of both theory and practical experience, the unique action-oriented learning approach helps develop vital business, analytical and leadership skills.

Apollo Medskills Ltd (AMSL) :Apollo Medskills was set up as a joint venture between Apollo Hospitals and National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) as part of setting up training institutes across the country. AMSL is a medical skills development institute in India to train and upgrade the skills of hospital workforce across the country. Through the collaboration with Apollo MedSkills, The Assam Kaziranga University’s School of Health Sciences aims to facilitate Postgraduate programme, Undergraduate programmes, Certificate programmes, nursing-related and other career progression programmes in the field of health and health management education. This will help students get exposure to world class Apollo Group of Hospitals and their partner hospitals for their 6months to 1 year internship.

Vertical Limit

Vertical Limit is an education service provider comprising of experienced industry professionals and academics who understand the rapidly changing dynamics of management education in India and brings in their expertise to develop skilled resources as opposed to generalists. Professionals from Vertical Limit work together with The Assam Kaziranga University School of Business to design and deliver skill based education which enables MBA students to get the career of their choice - whether it be in marketing, finance, digital marketing or human resources.
